text: tatha madyan[1] kee or hamane usake bhaee shoaib ko rasool banaakar bheja. usane kahah he meree jaati ke logo! allaah kee ibaadat (vandana) karo, usake siva tumhaara koee poojy nahin hai. tumhaare paas tumhaare paalanahaar ka khula tark (pramaan) aa gaya hai. atah naap aur tol pooree karo aur logon kee cheezon mein kamee na karo tatha dharatee mein usake sudhaar ke pashchaat upadrav na karo. yahee tumhaare lie uttm hai, yadi tum eemaan vaale ho
